description:
Mishima Industries hold a karaoke competition, and Nuku Nuku`s classmates invite her to sing with them. Kyusaku gets angry at her for going along with Mishima`s plans. She`s determined to participate anyway, but Kyusaku invents a robot to stop her by force... Can Nuku Nuku overcome this trial?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku Nesshou! Kazoku Taikou Utagassen!
Nuku Nuku`s hot song - Family singing contest
ヌクヌク熱唱! 家族対抗歌合戦!
